name: Faucet
description:
You have awoken in the night and need to use the restroom, though perhaps there is more to it than that. The less known the better

Feedback from Ludum Dare can be found at:http://feedback.ld.intricati.c...

Arrow keys and spacebar to control.

Small glitch: sometimes you will be required to press the spacebar several times to interact with an object
